resources.string:
In devices with Android 13 or higher, the system (may) provide an API to control the strength of the flashlight. This is a simple demo app that uses this feature. You can select the flashlight by pulling down and select the brightness of the flashlight by sliding the seekbar. If your device does not support this feature, you cannot turn on the flashlight through this app. 
Reference document https://source.android.google.cn/docs/core/camera/torch-strength-control

by tumuyan in 2024.7
